snippet: With the general election nine months off, there are several important stages that could prove to be turning points.
abstract: With the general election nine months off, there are several important stages that could prove to be turning points.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. - After a year or more of anticipation, actual votes have been cast. But the 2012 Republican presidential contest will not proceed in a straight line, evenly spaced out over the next six months. Rather, it is broken up into different phases, each of which will have its own, interesting political dynamic that will affect how the candidates campaign, how they hoard their cash and how they travel.

headline.main: With Preliminaries Over, Primary Season Gets Real
